Posts.Content: Hi I am in South Bucks. Diagnosed stage 4 nearly a year ago. Am on letrozole and Ibrance. I was first diagnosed 11 years ago and psychiatrist put me on Pregabelen. Been a wonderful drug for me. It was for anxiety but I found it really helps my depression which I’ve had since age 15. Pissing off this damned government also gives me pleasure!
Posts.Title: Depression and breast cancer
